title: Print, "Yale Summer School Program, Switzerland, 1988", 1988
signed: Imprinted in red ink, lower page, lower right: Design Paul Rand
dimensions:
60.8 x 20.3 cm (24 x 8 in. )-opened
30.4 x 20.3 cm (11 5/6 x 8 in.)-closed
description:
Off-white brochure, opens vertically.  Closed: recto and verso, blank. 
Opened:  upper 2/3 of upper page, vertical design, red square with a white cross in center (Swiss flag), within which is a partially obstructed black Y (Yale). Beneath design, lower 1/3 of page, imprinted in big black lettering: Yale Summer Program/ Graphic Design/ Brissago, Switzerland/ 18 June-25 July 1988. Lower page, 2 columns of text imprinted in red ink, describing the program, location, administration, faculty, visiting faculty, credit, eligibility, cost, admission, and financial aid.  Left column, space between location and administration, photograph of black and white bull dog.

tombstone.epitaph:
Print, "Yale Summer School Program, Switzerland, 1988", 1988.
1988. Offset lithograph on off-white paper. Gift of Marion S. Rand. 2002-11-35.
